statements: SELECT * FROM ConservationData;
SELECT id, species FROM ConservationData WHERE population > 10000;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ConservationData WHERE region = 'Amazon Rainforest';
SELECT species, region, conservation_status FROM ConservationData WHERE population < 5000 ORDER BY region ASC;
SELECT id, species, population FROM ConservationData WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered' ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConservationData WHERE region = 'Africa' ORDER BY species DESC
SELECT species, population FROM ConservationData WHERE population > 10000
SELECT id, species, conservation_status FROM ConservationData WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered' AND region IN ('Asia', 'Europe')
SELECT id, region, population FROM ConservationData WHERE population < 5000 ORDER BY region ASC, population DESC
SELECT * FROM ConservationData WHERE region = 'Australia' AND conservation_status = 'Vulnerable' ORDER BY population DESC
SELECT * FROM population_data;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM population_data ORDER BY species_name;
SELECT * FROM conservation_records WHERE conservation_success = TRUE;
SELECT location FROM conservation_records WHERE observation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT species_name, population_size, conservation_status FROM population_data WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM population_data WHERE species_name = 'Tiger' AND population_size > 1000 ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM population_data WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered' ORDER BY species_name, population_size ASC;
SELECT observation_date, location FROM conservation_records WHERE conservation_success = TRUE ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT population_size, conservation_status FROM population_data WHERE conservation_status = 'Vulnerable' ORDER BY population_size ASC;
SELECT record_id, observation_date, location FROM conservation_records WHERE location LIKE '%forest%' AND conservation_success = TRUE ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM conservation_agency;
SELECT agency_name, contact_info FROM conservation_agency;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM species_population WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM conservation_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT agency_name, species_name, project_name FROM conservation_agency INNER JOIN conservation_projects ON conservation_agency.agency_id = conservation_projects.agency_id;
SELECT * FROM conservation_agency;
SELECT agency_name, contact_info FROM conservation_agency WHERE agency_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM species_population ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM conservation_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT agency_name, species_name, project_name FROM conservation_projects JOIN conservation_agency ON conservation_projects.agency_id = conservation_agency.agency_id JOIN species_population ON conservation_projects.species_id = species_population.species_id;
SELECT * FROM population WHERE conservation_status='Endangered';
SELECT id, species, population_count FROM population ORDER BY species ASC;
SELECT org_name, location_id, budget FROM conservation_organization WHERE budget > 100000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT observation_date, location_id, observer_name FROM observation WHERE observation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND observation_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT region, latitude, longitude FROM location;
SELECT species, population_count FROM population WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered' ORDER BY species ASC;
SELECT org_name, budget, start_date FROM conservation_organization WHERE budget > 100000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT region, latitude, longitude FROM location WHERE region LIKE 'North%' AND latitude > 40 ORDER BY longitude ASC;
SELECT observation_date, observer_name FROM observation WHERE observation_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY observation_date DESC;

SELECT location.region, population.species, population.population_count FROM population JOIN location ON location.id = population.id WHERE population.population_count > 1000 ORDER BY population.population_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM Species ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT population_count, observation_date FROM PopulationData WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM Researcher;
SELECT species_name, research_topic FROM Species JOIN ResearchData ON Species.species_id = ResearchData.species_id;
SELECT * FROM Species ORDER BY species_name ASC, habitat_type DESC;
SELECT population_id, population_count, observation_date FROM PopulationData WHERE population_count > 100 ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM Species INNER JOIN ConservationEfforts ON Species.species_id = ConservationEfforts.species_id WHERE ConservationEfforts.effort_type = 'Habitat Restoration';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM Researcher WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'J%' OR researcher_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT research_topic, publication_date FROM ResearchData WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
